org.openimaj.math.statistics.distribution

Interface MultivariateDistribution

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    MultivariateGaussian
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractMultivariateDistribution, AbstractMultivariateGaussian, CachingMultivariateGaussian, DiagonalMultivariateGaussian, FullMultivariateGaussian, GaussianMixtureModelEM.EMGMM, MixtureOfGaussians, MultivariateKernelDensityEstimate, SphericalMultivariateGaussian

    public interface MultivariateDistribution
    A continuous multivariate distribution.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

      • sample

        double[][] sample(int count,
                  Random rng)
        Sample the distribution.
        Parameters:
        count - the number of samples to draw
        rng - the random number generator
        Returns:
        a list of sample vectors from this distribution
